channel.title: Friends Php Server Qmail Apache War on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Servers, I love Servers
item.description: So i set up my new server last night. You can visit it by going to dopeman.org. Its real real nice. hehe. Dual P3 700mhz, 1gig ram, dual 9 gig scsi drives.. damn is it fast. I am running apache, PHP, MYSQL, Qmail, Qpopper,. It rules. I am using the Zend Optimizer coupled with the BWARE cache to speed up PHP. Today, i am gunna tweak apache like a mofo and then i will secure it like a fortress.
